Ipswich Mobile Library Route 7

Contact us:

Managers: Andrew Little and David Cook

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Route 7 Town/village Location Time
MIP/7A Thwaite The Old Post Office 0930 – 0945
MIP/7B Wickham Skeith Swan House 0955 – 1010
MIP/7C Hoxne The Swan car park 1025 – 1050
MIP/7D Hoxne St Edmunds House 1100 – 1115
MIP/7E Denham Post Office 1125 – 1135
MIP/7F Thorndon Black Horse 1200 – 1220
MIP/7G Thorndon Crossroads 1225 – 1235
MIP/7H Brockford Street Lay-by 1245 – 1300
MIP/7I Wetheringsett Hockey Hill 1405 – 1420
MIP/7J Wetheringsett Wetherup Street 1430 – 1445
MIP/7K Wetheringsett Park Green 1450 – 1505
MIP/7L Mendlesham Fish and Chip shop 1515 – 1530
MIP/7M Mendlesham Recreation ground 1535 – 1550
MIP/7N Mendlesham The Green 1600 – 1620

Calling every 4 weeks on Thursdays:

2016: 21 January, 18 February, 17 March, 14 April, 12 May, 9 June, 7 July, 4 August, 1 September, 29 September, 27 October, 24 November, 22 December

2017: 19 January
